features: OUR HAIR CARE PROMISE FOR DAMAGED HAIR: Love Beauty and Planet Coconut Oil & Ylang Ylang Hope and Repair Hair Conditioner for dry hair gives hope for hair repair
HAIR CONDITIONER FOR DRY HAIR: Our Coconut Oil & Ylang Ylang Hair Conditioner for damaged hair is infused with coconut oil
HAIR REPAIR CONDITIONER WITH NATURE-INSPIRED INGREDIENTS: Let your hair bask in the early morning freshness of ylang ylang flower oil
YES Safe for Colored Hair, YES Vegan Hair Conditioner, YES with Plant Based Detanglers, YES Coconut Oil for hair, YES Fast Rinse, YES Ethically Sourced Extract YES Damaged Hair Treatment
CONDITIONER FOR DAMAGED HAIR WITH FIVE FREE FROMS: Paraben-free Conditioner, Silicone-free Conditioner, Dye-free Conditioner, Cruelty-free Conditioner, Phthalate-free Conditioner
This coconut oil infused vegan conditioner for damaged hair nourishes while helping to prevent hair breakage and split ends for smooth and healthy looking tresses. It is also 97% NATURALLY DERIVED
body.description: At Love Beauty and Planet our goal is to make you more beautiful and give a little love to the planet. We are committed to small acts of love for the planet. Our goal is a carbon footprint so small it's like we weren't even here. We started our journey by loading our beauty products with goodness. Every one of our conditioner bottles is made from 100% recycled materials and is recyclable. Our caps and pumps aren’t made from recycled plastics yet, but we’re working on it. All our conditioners are also cruelty-free, paraben free, silicone free, dye-free, phthalate free, and vegan. Our fast-rinse conditioner technology saves you from tangles and can help you save water Bring hope to damaged hair with our Hair Repair Conditioner for Dry Hair! Our hair repair conditioner for damaged hair is made with plant based detanglers and infused with coconut oil for hair. Let your hair bask in the early morning freshness of Ylang Ylang, sourced ethically from the island of Mohéli in the Comoros. How to use? After shampooing, spread through your gorgeous wet locks. Avoid the roots, rinse. Go easy on the tap! For brilliantly beautiful hair with our other damaged hair products, start with our Love Beauty and Planet Coconut Oil & Ylang Ylang Hope and Repair Shampoo and finish with our Coconut Oil & Ylang Ylang Hope and Repair Hair Oil. Don’t stop with beautiful hair. Bathe your skin with our Love Beauty and Planet Coconut & Ylang Ylang Tropical Hydration Body Wash. We are starting a beautiful movement. Are you in? To learn more about this damaged hair treatment and our other conditioners for dry hair visit our website or check out our instagram.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Love Beauty and Planet Hope And Repair Coconut Oil & Ylang Ylang Conditioner is cruelty-free, paraben-free, silicone-free, dye-free, and formulated without phthalates. Designed to give your hair a vibrant boost of radiance, this conditioner works to visibly repair hair and prevent split ends .

Cruelty-Free and Vegan Shampoo Loving the planet means caring for all creatures who share it, so we are independently cruelty-free and vegan by PETA. Natural Coconut Oil for Hair Lock in moisture and let your strands keep flowing strong and free with our coconut oil infused conditioner for damage repair. Repair Damaged Hair Our silicone-free conditioner is designed to visibly repair damaged strands and help prevent split ends. Ethically Sourced Ylang Ylang Extract These yellow flowers, rich in essential oils, are handpicked and immediately distilled to keep their purest scent.

Love Beauty and Planet Coconut Oil & Ylang Ylang Shampoo Love Beauty and Planet Coconut Oil & Ylang Ylang Shampoo and Conditioner Love Beauty and Planet Coconut Oil & Ylang Ylang Deodorant Stick Main Benefit This sulfate-free shampoo is supremely hydrating and designed to visibly repair damaged hair. Bring hope to damaged hair with our shampoo and conditioner for women, infused with ethically sourced ylang ylang from the island of Mohéli in Comoros. This vegan deodorant is made with plant-based deodorizers for 24-hour protection. Infused with ylang ylang extract, this deodorant will keep you smelling fresh all day long.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 23, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars If you have normal hair, works perfect; great price on amazon
reviews.reviewText: Amazon & target both have the best price for value on this. You save way more buying this than the smaller size, also the scent is perfect not overwhelming at all, smells lightly of coconut - like a vacation, so great if you're sensitive to scents, but this only works if you have normal slightly thick to thin hair that doesn't have build up. If you shower daily and don't have greasy hair this is perfect, it cleans just enough without being harsh.I buy this for my mom, it's perfect for her - it does NOT work for me, my hair is extremely thick and gets greasy very fast and since I use product to straighten it, this shampoo does nothing. Leaves behind all the buildup from product, so would not recommend for hair types like mines.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Softer Hair, Heavenly Scent
reviews.reviewText: This works very well for my dry hair type. The scent is light, pleasant and calming. My hair is softer and feels adequatly moisturized. I really like that it comes in a bottle made from recycled plastic. The company seems to be very environmentally conscious.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Overall Conditioner I have tried
reviews.reviewText: Has a great coconut scent. It isn't too over the top but if you pass your hand through you hand you can still smell it. Lack of silicones creates less build up. Leaves hair nice and smooth like other conditioners.Inexpensive conditioner that surprisingly offers a lot for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Poor pump. Great product
reviews.reviewText: I have really long hair. The pump only gives tiny amounts per pump and I was having to pump 20+ times to get enough out. Now I just take the pump off. It's easier and faster that way. The conditioner itself is great. It doesn't weigh my hair down and helps my curls stay tangle free. I'll keep getting the conditioner. I might go to a different size to avoid the pump.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My favorite conditioner! It smells like the beach but sweeter!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this-huge pump bottle is a plus!
reviews.reviewText: Pleasant light scent. Large bottle with pump is great. Great value. clean ingredients. Thick consistency conditioner- Just 1 pump of conditioner is effective. Will buy again if pricing stays so reasonable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Smells amazing and works so well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’m bummed out because I didn’t check the item before the return date. The pump on the bottle doesn’t work. I’ve tried trouble shooting and still nothing. So now I have this huge bottle of conditioner that I’m going to have to take the pump off every time and shake into my hands. :/
